item.title: Deploying a Kubernetes-Based Media Server
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Robert Melcher)
item.description: For a long time, I’ve been on the hunt for a comprehensive and well-crafted tutorial to deploy a media server on my Kubernetes cluster. Let’s dive into Jellyfin, Radarr, Sonarr, Jackett, and qBittorrent.
